english.segment1: Verse 1: As for me God came and found me. As for me He took me home. As for me He gave me a family. And I'll never walk alone
english.segment2: In my life I'm soaked in blessing. And in heaven there's a great reward. As for me and my house, we're gonna to serve the Lord!
english.segment3: Bridge: I've got Jesus, Jesus. He calls me for His own. And He lifts me, lifts me. Above the world I know
english.segment4: Chorus: God is in the house, there is no doubt. God is in the house, can't keep Him out. As for you (As for you). As for me (As for me). We're gonna serve the Lord!.
